data.name: ActiveXControlInstallFailed
data.value: The ActiveX Control failed to install.

data.name: ActiveXControlUninstallFailed
data.value: The ActiveX Control failed to uninstall.

data.name: AddressNotUnderstood
data.value: The address ({0}) wasn't understood. Please report this bug.

data.name: AnotherInstanceCausingInterference
data.value: Another instance of Flashpoint Secure Player is preventing the Modifications from being activated.

data.name: AsAdministratorUser
data.value: as Administrator User

data.name: ConfigurationFailedLoad
data.value: The configuration failed to load. Please ensure Flashpoint is not corrupted, was extracted correctly, and is not running from OneDrive or a network drive.

data.name: CurationMissingTemplateName
data.value: This curation is missing a template name.

data.name: DownloadingGameFile
data.value: A game file is being downloaded.

data.name: EnvironmentVariablesFailed
data.value: The Environment Variables failed.

data.name: FailedCreateCustomSecurityManager
data.value: Failed to create a Custom Security Manager.

data.name: FailedGetParentProcessEXEFileName
data.value: Failed to get the Parent Process EXE File Name.

data.name: FlashpointProxyNotEnabled
data.value: The Flashpoint Proxy could not be enabled.

data.name: FlashpointSecurePlayer
data.value: Flashpoint Secure Player

data.name: GameFailedLaunch
data.value: This game failed to launch {0}.

data.name: GameIsMissingFiles
data.value: The game files ({0}) are missing. Please ensure Flashpoint is not corrupted, was extracted correctly, and is not running from OneDrive or a network drive.

data.name: GameNotActiveXControl
data.value: This game is not a valid ActiveX Control.

data.name: GameNotCuratedCorrectly
data.value: This game was not curated correctly. Please report this bug.

data.name: JobObjectNotCreated
data.value: The Job Object could not be created. Is your Windows Version new enough? Flashpoint only supports Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, and Windows 10.

data.name: LaunchGame
data.value: This game will not work unless run {0}. Do you want to launch it {0}? If you choose No, the application will exit.

data.name: NoGameSelected
data.value: No game was selected to start, so the application is exiting.

data.name: NoModeSelected
data.value: No mode was selected.

data.name: OldCPUSimulatorFailed
data.value: The Old CPU Simulator failed. The Target Rate may be invalid.

data.name: OpenFlashpointLauncher
data.value: Open the Flashpoint Launcher by opening the Start Flashpoint shortcut in the Flashpoint folder.

data.name: ProcessCompatibilityConflict
data.value: The process {0} causes a compatibility conflict with this game. Please close it to continue.

data.name: ProcessFailedStart
data.value: The process failed to start.

data.name: RegistryBackupAlreadyInProgress
data.value: The Registry Backup cannot start because another one is already in progress.

data.name: RegistryBackupFailed
data.value: The Registry Backup failed.

data.name: RegistryBackupInProgress
data.value: A Registry Backup is in progress. Please do not turn off your computer.

data.name: RegistryBackupNotInProgress
data.value: The Registry Backup cannot be stopped because no Registry Backup was in progress.

data.name: RegistryBackupWasSuccessful
data.value: The Registry Backup was successful.

data.name: RequiredComponentsAreLoading
data.value: The required components are loading. Please do not turn off your computer.

data.name: RequiredComponentsAreUnloading
data.value: The required components are unloading. Please do not turn off your computer.

data.name: UnknownProcessCompatibilityConflict
data.value: An unknown process is causing a compatibility conflict with this game, and the application cannot continue.

data.name: UseFlashpointLauncher
data.value: Please use the Flashpoint Launcher to select a game to start.

data.name: WindowsVersionTooOld
data.value: Your Windows Version is too old for Flashpoint Secure Player. Flashpoint supports Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, and Windows 10.

data.name: WithCompatibilitySettings
data.value: with Compatibility Settings

data.name: WithOldCPUSimulator
data.value: with Old CPU Simulator
